name: Banana Ben
description:
Cut the string and make the banana go straight to Bens mouth,
This little bugger is always hungry and you need to feed him well.

Cut through all levels with grade A score to unlock more tricky tasks along the way.

Simple and fun brainteaser for any age to play,
no violence or scary stuff in here, just 100% fun and awesome play,
NO in app purchases or anything!
